text: John William Bettany (born 16 December 1937) is an English former professional footballer who played in the Football League as a wing half for Huddersfield Town, Barnsley and Rotherham United in the 1960s and 1970s. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:People from Maltby, South Yorkshire Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players Category:Barnsley F.C. players Category:Rotherham United F.C. players Category:Goole Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Sportspeople from Yorkshire
title: John Bettany
